fields.label: New Row
fields.name: new_row
fields.instructions: This will add a new row, in which you can add multiple blocks/columns of content, be them text, images, video, or archived content.

sub_fields.label: Number of blocks in this row?
sub_fields.name: blocks_in_row
sub_fields.instructions:
Select the number of horizontal blocks for this row. (Blocks will stack as the device width decreases.)
Banners, Galleries and Archives require the whole width, so please only select 1 block if this row will be one of those content types.

sub_fields.label: Block Background Colour
sub_fields.name: block_background_colour_1
sub_fields.instructions: Select the colour of the background for this block.

sub_fields.label: Component
sub_fields.name: component_1
sub_fields.instructions: Select the content to fill this block.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter either the full video URL or the video ID (YouTube).

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: Choose an image to be used as a poster while the video is not playing. (If you leave this blank, the default poster image from youtube will be pulled in)

sub_fields.label: Playback Type
sub_fields.name: video_playback_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether the video will be played inline on the page, or open in a lightbox overlay.

sub_fields.label: Banner
sub_fields.name: banner
sub_fields.instructions: Add a new banner

sub_fields.label: Banner Title
sub_fields.name: banner_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the banner title.

sub_fields.label: Banner Subtitle
sub_fields.name: banner_subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the banner subtitle.

sub_fields.label: Banner Link
sub_fields.name: banner_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the URL where the banner needs to go.

sub_fields.label: Banner Image
sub_fields.name: banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: The banner image. Optimal size it at least: 0000px wide, 000px tall.

sub_fields.label: Gallery Item
sub_fields.name: gallery_item
sub_fields.instructions: Add a new gallery item

sub_fields.label: Type of gallery item
sub_fields.name: type_of_gallery_item
sub_fields.instructions: What kind of gallery item is this?

sub_fields.label: Image Title
sub_fields.name: image_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the image title.

sub_fields.label: Image Link
sub_fields.name: image_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the URL where the banner needs to go (if any).

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: The image. Optimal size it at least: 0000px wide, 000px tall.

sub_fields.label: Video Title
sub_fields.name: video_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the video title.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the youtube ID/url

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: Pick an image to be used as the poster before the video plays.

sub_fields.label: Type of Archive
sub_fields.name: type_of_archive
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of archive you would like to display.

sub_fields.label: Component
sub_fields.name: component_2
sub_fields.instructions: Select the content to fill this block.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter either the full video URL or the video ID (YouTube).

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: Choose an image to be used as a poster while the video is not playing. (If you leave this blank, the default poster image from youtube will be pulled in)

sub_fields.label: Playback Type
sub_fields.name: video_playback_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether the video will be played inline on the page, or open in a lightbox overlay.

sub_fields.label: Component
sub_fields.name: component_3
sub_fields.instructions: Select the content to fill this block.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter either the full video URL or the video ID (YouTube).

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: Choose an image to be used as a poster while the video is not playing. (If you leave this blank, the default poster image from youtube will be pulled in)

sub_fields.label: Playback Type
sub_fields.name: video_playback_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether the video will be played inline on the page, or open in a lightbox overlay.

fields.label: Default preview image
fields.name: default_preview_image
fields.instructions: This is the image that will appear when previewing in a latest/best/archive component.
